sections.heading: of application and construction
sections.text: The Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of the act among states enacting it.SourceLaws 1989, LB 377, ยง 7.

76-2007.Uniformity of application and construction.

The Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of the act among states enacting it.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 377, ยง 7.
